roleset.name: to get stuck

example.name: transitive
example.text: Douglas Stoneman , vice president of Shell Canada , noted that producers would prefer [*-2] to avoid hearings into competing proposals that [*T*]would lengthen the regulatory review process and bog down development .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: [*-2] Taken [*-1]together , the auto-sales and durable-goods reports confirmed perceptions that the economy is bogging down .

roleset.note: BOG_DOWN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bog' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Frames created by Olga (from bog.01-v)
